itinerary_summary: Explore the vibrant city of Milan over three days, immersing yourself in its art, culture, and culinary delights while discovering hidden gems and enjoying beach activities nearby.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Arrive in Milan and kick off your adventure by exploring iconic sites and sampling local cuisine.

activities.description: Stroll through this stunning shopping gallery featuring high-end boutiques and exquisite architecture.
Indulge in delicious panzerotti, a local specialty, at this popular eatery known for its savory pastries.
Explore the grand rooms and stunning art exhibitions of this historic royal palace.
Discover the rich history of Milan at this impressive castle, which houses several museums and collections.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Take a day enjoying Milan's cultural gems and hidden spots, with beach activities on the agenda.

activities.activity_name: Leonardo da Vinci Museum of Science and Technology

location.name: Leonardo da Vinci Museum of Science and Technology

activities.description: Enjoy innovative exhibits focused on science and Leonardo's contributions to technology.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Ristorante Da Giacomo, Milan
activities.description: Dine at this classic Italian restaurant known for its fantastic seafood and elegant atmosphere.
Wander through this artistic district filled with galleries, boutiques, and charming cafés.

activities.activity_name: Day Trip to Varenna, Lake Como
activities.description: Take a scenic train ride to Varenna and explore the picturesque lakeside town, perfect for beach activities.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Wrap up your Milan getaway with visits to local markets and a relaxing day by the beach.

activities.description: Start your day with delicious pastries and coffee at this hip bakery.
Explore this vibrant market featuring local produce, gourmet products, and diverse food stalls.

activities.activity_name: Relax at I Due Pini Beach
activities.description: Head to the beach for some relaxation and enjoy sunbathing on this beautiful Lido.
Wrap up your trip with a hearty dinner at this traditional trattoria known for Milanese cuisine.
